itl.enabler.api

Interface HoseCollection.HoseCollectionEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    HoseCollection

    public static interface HoseCollection.HoseCollectionEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Listens to events from every Hose in the collection.
    Clients can either implement this interface to receive events on the whole Hose Collection or subscribe to events from individual hoses.
    See Also:
    Hose.HoseEventListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OnTotalsChanged(java.util.EventObject ev)
      Event handler for the OnTotalsChanged event for any hose in the collection

    • Method Detail

      • OnTotalsChanged

        void OnTotalsChanged(java.util.EventObject ev)
        Event handler for the OnTotalsChanged event for any hose in the collection

        Note :
        The sender will be the actual hose whose totals changed.
